title: Wedding invitation font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319044047im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_570xN_4437.511876169_n3zj.jpg)

I`m trying to identify this font so that I can make a DIY wedding invitation! thanks for your help!
author: ANNEJULIEWEDDING

comments.content: The tall skinny is [Men In Black Credits](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319044047/http:/www.dafont.com/men-in-black-credits.font). Can't recognize the other one for the moment.
I think Copperplate Gothic or Modern-style typeface. You can search for other [online wedding cards vendor](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319044047/http:/www.123weddingcards.com/).
